SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.card2brain.exception

Klasse ExceptionHandlerAdvice

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.card2brain.exception.ExceptionHandlerAdvice
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
HasLogger
@ControllerAdvice public class ExceptionHandlerAdvice extends Object implements HasLogger
The ExceptionHandlerAdvice class provides a centralized exception handling mechanism for the application. It implements the HasLogger interface which provides the logging functionality. It has several @ExceptionHandler methods which handle specific exceptions and return a response with appropriate HTTP status code and error message.

For example, the handleException method for UserNotValidException returns a response with HTTP status code 406 (NOT_ACCEPTABLE) and the error message from the exception.

Seit:
16.01.2023
